document.docName: Huber_Kwapong_2013Pholcid spiders from the Lower Guinean region of Central Africa .pdf.imf (Done).imf
document.masterDocTitle: West African pholcid spiders: an overview, with descriptions of five new species (Araneae, Pholcidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: West African pholcid spiders: an overview, with descriptions of five new species (Araneae, Pholcidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
6.
Crossopriza lyoni (Blackwall, 1867)
. Mali, Nigeria (
Huber et al. 1999
); newly recorded for Senegal, The Gambia, Guinea, Sierra Leone, Ivory Coast, Ghana, Burkina Faso, Benin, and Niger.

SENEGAL : Kaolack Prov .: 1 ♀ 1 juv. in ZFMK ( Ar 5207 ), Sonkoron, Kaymor Region [~ 13°47’N , 15°33’W ],
Jul. 1993
( M. Sarr .)
.

THE GAMBIA : 3 ♀♀ in ZFMK ( Ar 5404 ), Banjul ( 13°27.6’N , 16°34.7’W ), on wall ,
20 Oct. 2008
( Yu.M. Marusik )
;
1 ♂ 2 ♀♀ in MRAC ( 205485 ), Serekunda [ 13°26’N , 16°41’W ], in grass ,
20 Aug. 1996
( G. Beyens )
.

GUINEA : 1 ♂ 2 ♀♀ in pure ethanol in ZFMK ( Gui 103 ), Conakry , in building ( 9°34.1’N , 13°39.7’W ),
40 m
a.s.l.,
18 Nov. 2008
( B.A. Huber )
.
Guinée Forestière : 1 ♂ in ZFMK ( Ar 10454 ), Nzérékoré (~ 7°45.3’N , 8°49.2’W ),
480 m
a.s.l., in building ,
28 Nov. 2008
( B.A. Huber )
;
3 ♂♂ 4 ♀♀ in ZFMK ( Ar 10455 ), Kissidougou , in building ( 9°11.2’N , 10°05.6’W ),
540 m
a.s.l.,
26 Nov. 2008
( B.A. Huber )
;
2 ♀♀ 3 juvs in pure ethanol, in ZFMK ( Gui 90 ), same data
.
Basse-Guinée : 1 ♂ 1 ♀ in ZFMK ( Ar 10456 ),
Kindia
, in building ( 10°03’N , 12°51’W ),
400 m
a.s.l.,
20 Nov. 2008
( B.A. Huber )
.
SIERRA LEONE : 1 ♀ in MRAC ( 174657 ), Makeni [ 8°53’N , 12°03’W ], “maison ”,
19 Jan. 1993
( F. Rensonnet )
.

IVORY COAST : 2 ♀♀ 1 juv. in CAS , Bouaké [ 7°42’N , 5°02’W ],
10 Jan. 1991
( W.J. Pulawski )
;
1 ♀ in SMF , Comoé National Park, Research Station Univ. of Würzburg [~ 9.1°N , 3.7°W ],
23 Sep. 2002
( S. Otto )
;
5 ♂♂ 11 ♀♀ 9 juvs in CAS , Korhogo [ 9°28’N , 5°38’W ],
12 Jan. 1991
( W.J. Pulawski )
.
MALI : 1 ♂ in CAS ,
10 km E Sévaré
( 14°30’N , 4°00’W ),
15 Jul.-1 Sep. 1977
( W.H. Settle )
;
1 ♀ in MRAC ( 136760 ), Kogoni ,
60 km N Niono
[~ 14°50’N , 6°00’W ],
Dec. 1969
( G. Pierrard )
;
2 ♂♂ 8 ♀♀ in MRAC ( 136761, 138808 ), M’Pesoba [ Mpessoba , 12°40’N , 5°43’W ],
Sep.-Oct. 1969
and
Sep. 1970
( G. Pierrard )
.

BURKINA FASO : ~ 11 ♂♂ 18 ♀♀ (3 vials) in MRAC ( 128066, 068-069 ), Ouagadougou [ 12°22’N , 1°31’W ],

;
